title: Music Embeddings & Compression
excerpt: Exploring how compression affects music embeddings, personalized discovery via few-shot learning, and visualizing millions of artists in embedding space.

title: High-Dimensional Embedding Visualization
excerpt: Interactive 2D visualization with epsilon distance slider, cell splitting concepts, and a novel approach to hypertunable data compression.

title: Memory-Mapped Settings Cache
excerpt: Using memory-mapped files in C for robust, crash-safe application settings that persist across sessions with low overhead.

title: Dimensionality Reduction Comparison
excerpt: Comparing UMAP, PCA, t-SNE on different modalities (text, video) with parameter search strategies for optimal dimension selection.

title: Motion Detection & Information-Dense Frames
excerpt: Finding the most interesting frames in video using motion detection, frame subtraction, and priority queues for key frame extraction.
